author: nordbjerg
content: Hi guys, I'm looking at `ExecutionPayloadHeader` in consensus specs, it seems to have all the roots (e.g. transactions root, ...), but not requests root, is this intentional?

author: tersec
content: This is being/has been refactored, see https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3875

author: tersec
content: In general, `hash_tree_root(someExecutionPayloadHeader) == hash_tree_root(someExecutionPayload)` so they do have to have matching fields
